name: Tatics Arena project
description:
This is my prototyping for a strategy game resembling an old online favourite called Tatics arena. https://tatics-beta.taorankings.com

The working units: Scout, Pyromancer, Dark Magic Witch

Unfinished: Assassin, Cleric

In development: Knight, Enchantress

The top units will eventually be a second player once the code is finished.

Rules:

1) Click on a unit to select. 

2) Click in blue squares to move.

3) Double click on red squares to attack.

4) Click on direction to set direction of character. 

5) It will then end turn and allow you to select another character. 

** Please note, it is still a big work in progress so none of the characters are finished. Please enjoy and rate! Any feedback is appreciated.
